overview.challenge: Create a comprehensive healthcare marketing campaign that builds trust while remaining accessible and professional. The challenge was to communicate complex medical services in a way that feels approachable to patients.
overview.solution: Developed a clean, medical-focused design system with calming colors and clear typography. Created multiple touchpoints including print ads, digital campaigns, and promotional materials.
overview.impact: Increased patient engagement by 40% and improved brand recognition in the healthcare sector.
